Interface Medium

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Material
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface Medium
extends Serializable
    Simulates how light travels through a medium.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel
